title: Wireless Telecom Group Announces Appointment of Daniel Monopoli as General Manager, Test & Measurement
text:
Wireless Telecom Group, Inc. 
PARSIPPANY, N.J. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Wireless Telecom Group, Inc., a global provider of radio frequency and microwave-based components and instruments for wireless and advanced communications industries, announced today the appointment of Daniel Monopoli as General Manager, Test & Measurement overseeing the Company’s Boonton Electronics and Noisecom brands. 
Daniel comes to Wireless Telecom Group, Inc. with almost 15 years of experience in the Test & Measurement industry. Throughout his career, Daniel has demonstrated leadership in the areas of executive management, strategic product development, marketing and technical sales. 
Prior to joining Wireless Group, Inc., Daniel most recently held the position of Vice President of Marketing and Product Management at Teledyne LeCroy, Inc. where he was instrumental in the recent introduction of high resolutions Oscilloscopes. 
“Daniel’s experience in new product development and strategic product launches immediately supports our growth strategies for our Test & Measurement business segment,” stated Paul Genova, CEO of Wireless Telecom Group, Inc. “Customers have long respected our Boonton Electronics and Noise Com brands as superior, high quality performing instruments that meet unique measurement needs. We are excited to have Daniel as a member of our team and look forward to Daniel applying his leadership experience, building upon the solid reputation of our brands and expanding them into new applications and markets.” 
Daniel holds an M.B.A from Columbia University, a Master of Engineering from Stevens Institute of Technology and a BSEE from Binghamton University.

About Wireless Telecom Group, Inc. 
Wireless Telecom Group designs and manufactures radio frequency (RF) and microwave-based products for wireless and advanced communications industries and markets its products and services worldwide under the Boonton, Microlab and Noisecom brands. Its complementary suite of high performance components and instruments includes RF combiners and broadband combiner boxes for in-building distributed antenna systems deployments (DAS), RF power splitters and diplexers, hybrid couplers, peak power meters, signal analyzers, noise modules, precision noise generators. The Company serves both commercial and government markets including, WiFi, WiMAX, satellite, cable, radar, avionics and medical technologies and industries. Wireless Telecom Group is headquartered in Parsippany, New Jersey, in the New York City metropolitan area, and maintains a global network of Sales and Service offices for excellent product service and support.
